name: Builder's Ruler
lore:
&6Ability: Area Planner  &e&lRIGHT CLICK&r
&7Right-Click the top of a block to
&7place a line of blocks.

&6Ability: Organized Builder  &e&lSNEAK RIGHT CLICK&r
&7Sneak Right-Click a block to collect
&7all blocks in a line.

&6Ability: Built-in Storage  &e&lLEFT CLICK&r
&7Opens the ruler storage. Blocks will
&7be placed from your inventory or
&7the ruler storage.

&6&lLEGENDARY&r
